courses.title: Es reicht! Befreie deine alte Wut und verwandele sie in MUT
courses.bio: Nutze die Kraft deiner wunderbaren Wut
objectives: Gesunde Abgrenzung und Durchsetzungsfähigkeit
WUTKraft richtig verstehen und als Lebenskraft nutzen
Innere Wutanteile in ihrem Ausdruck nachreifen lassen
Mehr Lebenskraft durch das sanfte lösen von gebundenen Emotionen
Angst vor intensiven Emotionen überwinden
Mehr Kraft und Stabilität im Alltag
"Nein" sagen, ohne Angst vor Ablehnung
Harmoniesucht überwinden
Authentischerer Ausdruck deiner wahren Natur

Psychoedukation - Lerne deine Wut kennen: Wie geht es deiner Wut? Was ist erlöste Wut?
In deiner Urwut liegt deine URKRAFT
Inner Work: Lerne deine innere Welt noch: 2. Wutbook zum Download: Aus Wut wird Mut

requirements: Die Bereitschaft und Mut zur Selbstbeobachtung und Selbsterkenntnis
courses.description:
In diesem Kurs wirst du befähigt, deine gebundene Lebenskraft zu befreien. Mache es dir gemütlich und genieße diese intensive Session und die Begegnung mit deiner Urkraft.
Ja, Du darfst wütend werden!
Du wirst wütend werden!
Du darfst deine inneren Feuerkräfte endlich so spüren und richtig entfalten wie sie gedacht sind.

Keine Angst, vor deiner inneren Wutkraft sie ist pure Bewegungskraft und Wärme - sie ist dem Element Feuer zugeordnet. Darin sind so viele Lebenssäfte und Kräfte enthalten.
Du wirst lernen unterdrückte Wutenergie, sanft und sicher zu spüren und zum Fließen zu bringen.
Wut ist nur dann blind und wütet wie ein Monster, wenn wir sie unterdrücken. Wenn wir sie bewusst einladen, wird sie unsere beste Verbündete, wenn es darum geht unsere Wahrheit und unser wahres Selbst zu leben.
Deine Wut verrät verletzten Werte und Grenzen, sie ist dazu gedacht dich zu schützen und dich im Leben durchzusetzen.
Das geht nur in einem reifen und natürlichen Ausdruck. Leider haben die meisten Menschen in der Kindheit gelernt, ihre Wutkräfte zu unterdrücken. Dadurch konnten diese Aspekte nicht mitwachsen und reifen.
Sie liegen verborgen und blitzen manchmal vielleicht unkontrolliert durch oder und so verboten, dass dein Körper völlig kraftlos und dein mentaler zustand einer Depression gleicht. Bist du bereit deine inneren Kräfte zu entfesseln und dich deiner wahren Natur ein großes Stück anzunähern?

Bist du bereit für dieenn nächsten riesengroßen Meilenstein?
Ja?
Dann sorge gut für dich, lege dir ein wunderschönes Notizbuch und deinen zauberhaften Stift bereit.

Viele Erkenntnisse und spannende Impulse beim schauen und lauschen und mehr ;)


Deine ANNA Beck
target_audience: Menschen auf ihrem Selbstheilungsweg

courses.title: 「怒りんぼのあなたは実は寂しがり？」心のワーク5ステップ【実践心理学入門】〜自分のイライラに疲れているあなたへ〜
courses.bio: イライラの気持ち、怒りの気持ちによって、冷静でいられない、もっと優しい気持ちになりたい、そう思っている人は多くおられます。この講座では、怒りやイライラの原因を知って、「イライラしない穏やかなあなた」になるための方法をわかりやすく学ぶことがで
objectives: イライラ・怒りの気持ちを無理なく抑える方法を身につけることができるようになる。
イライラ・怒りに無駄なエネルギーを使わなくなるため、人生が前向きになます。
イライラ・怒りの気持ちに邪魔されないため、 コミュニケーションが円滑になります。
イライラ・無駄な怒りに振り回されないため、ビジネスにも前向きに取り組むことができ、成功につながります。
心理カウンセラーとして、活動に向けて学習したい人。
心理カウンセリングのツールが必要な人。この講座をそのまま使用できます。

はじめに: 1-1 こんなお悩みありませんか？
1-2 受講する前に
1-3 自己紹介
1-4 怒りに振り回された過去の私
1-5 この講座の全体像
1-6 この講座で得られるもの
怒り感情の方程式を知る: 2-1 怒り感情の方程式を知る
怒りのマグマの正体を知る: 3-1 怒りのマグマ噴出の仕組み
怒りやすい人って実はどんな人？: 4-1 怒りやすい人の隠れた特徴
4-3 甘えの欲求①「わかってほしい」
4-4 甘えの欲求②「認めてほしい」
4-5 甘えの欲求③「かまってほしい」
4-6 甘えの欲求④「思い通りにさせてほしい」
4-7 怒りやすい人の隠れた特徴 まとめ
自己肯定感と「怒り」: 5-1 怒り感情の方程式（復習）
5-2 自肯定感と相手肯定感
5-3 怒りにつながる心のポジション
怒りやすい体質ってあるの？: 6-1 身体と心の状態は密接
イライラしない自分になるワーク５ステップ: 7-1 ワーク５ステップ、全体像
7-2 ステップ１ 心のゴミを掃除する
7-3 ステップ２ 最近イライラした出来事
7-4 ステップ３ 元々の一次感情の洗い出し
7-5 ステップ４ なぜその感情が発生したのか
7-6 ステップ５ 原因となった過去の出来事
穏やかな心のメンテナンス法: 8-1 穏やかな心のメンテナンス法
8-2 ワーク５ステップを繰り返す
8-3 栄養バランスを考えた食事
8-4 散歩と幸せホルモンの分泌
8-5 感謝と幸せホルモンの関係

requirements: 誰でも受講できます。
courses.description:
下記を一度でも悩んだことがあるのなら、このオンラインコースはあなたにとって最適です。


友達に送ったLINEが既読になっているのに返信が遅いとイライラする
友達や家族に自分の気持ちをわかってもらえなくてイライラすることがある
飲食店の店員のルーズな態度に腹が立つことがある
上司や同僚、部下にキレそうになったこと、あるいはキレてしまったことがある
混んでいる電車の中で座席で足を組んでいる、リュックを背負ったまでいる、など、マナーを守らない人を見ると腹が立つ
怒鳴って、周囲や相手に不愉快にさせてしまったことがある。今はなくても過去にある。
相手から嫌なことを言われると、口には出さないが、心の中で自分や相手を責めてしまう
後で冷静に考えてみると、イライラやムカムカなど、の感情は必ずしも必要ではなかった
怒ったことで、後で嫌な感情になった


こうした悩みを持っている人の多くは、
もっと理論的に相手に指摘すればよかった
もっと冷静になって話ができるようになりたい
冷静な対処ができるようになりたい
と、考えている人が多いです。
この講座は、こうした人に受講していただくことで、上記のような悩みや疑問を解決することができます。
今すぐ受講して前向きな人生を歩んでいきましょう！
target_audience: イライラとしている自分が嫌だ、変わりたい、と思っている人
心理カウンセラーとして、活動してみたい人にも適してます。

courses.title: Social Confidence for Introverts
courses.bio: Enhance your social skills and see instant results

Introduction: How to get personal support fast!
Understanding your mind: Being an introvert does not determine behavior or potential.
Where our nerves, stress and other feelings actually come from
How to use your Growth Zone to easily increase your confidence
Separating your self-doubt and criticism from your reasoning and logic
How to rid yourself of your self-critical thinking
Low versus high energy charisma - what works best?
Why an introvert's down-time is a huge advantage
How to recharge your social energy fast and often
Communication techniques: Why making a "good first impression" is a bad idea
A successful conversation's three secret ingredients
What creates engaging and exciting conversations that leaves people wanting more
The one thing you have to do to get the social results you want
Lastly: What we've learned - and how to get good at it

requirements: None
courses.description:
Are you an introvert who lacks the confidence and communication tools that allow you to enjoy socializing and networking?
Do you wish you could effortlessly create the kind of conversations and relationships you genuinely enjoy?
Have other confidence programs and “gurus” left you feeling shortchanged or offered only short-term relief?
Welcome to Social Confidence for Introverts, the unrivaled personal-transformation program created by Norway’s most high-profile “social coach,” TJ Guttormsen. For over a decade, TJ has helped thousands of people who identify as introverts achieve breathtaking results that stick.


"Best course by a long shot! The way TJ explains and breaks everything down is absolutely brilliant! For me personally, best teacher on here and I couldn’t recommend this course enough. Have already downloaded TJ’s other course and can’t wait to get started." - BEN YATES, UDEMY STUDENT
"It was an amazing experience through out. It is beyond the expectation. I have boosted my skills and pretty confident now. Thank you so much for this wonderful experience." - JAYSHREE VYKUNTAM, UDEMY STUDENT


With more than 100 national media appearances to date, TJ’s expertise on the subject of social confidence is widely sought after by television, radio, newspaper and magazine reporters.
Over the past decade, TJ has shared the stage with many celebrated self-help experts and change-work practitioners. He has also published books, produced courses, taught workshops and performed 1-to-1 coaching with astoundingly powerful results that have surprised the industry.
TJ’s work is backed up by three university degrees in psychology and pedagogy—as well as a Mensa qualification.


"This course has put the concept of 'introvert' into perspective for me so that I don't see it as negative or a problem that I have anymore. I'm so happy I took this course because now I know how to nurture myself properly to re-energize and gain understanding from others without feeling bad.
TJ has given me some great conversation techniques and ways to move from self doubt to action. All for FREE! Thanks TJ - your knowledge and methodologies have been incredibly helpful, insightful and practical." - DESPINA MALAS, UDEMY STUDENT
"This free course has been vastly superior to other paid Udemy courses..." - PAUL, UDEMY STUDENT


The three pillars of social confidence
With a sharp focus on mind mastery, social awareness, and artful communication, the program takes students on a remarkable journey of self-discovery rooted in the most advanced and sophisticated modern approaches to human psychology.


"This is a wonderful course. Up to the point and very well presented. But it is not only the information that is well researched and presented in an easy understandable and structured way.
What makes this course so special is that TJ Guttormsen makes an excellent job presenting the material. His body language, voice, tone and even his eye movements underline his credibility and underline that he lives according to his standards. So to wrap it up, if there were 10 point to give, I'd give it a 12!!!" - CLAUDIA TOMASCHECK, UDEMY STUDENT
"A real eye opener I love how you broke it down. I now understand why I react a certain way compared to my extrovert friends. This will help me move out of my comfort zone and grow as an individual. Thanks so much." - CAROLE RAMOS, UDEMY STUDENT


By unmasking the dark psychological programming holding most introverts back, the program is designed to quickly and dramatically upgrade your self-confidence, revolutionize your relationships and enhance how others perceive you.
Inside you will discover the three pillars of social confidence:
1. A solid grasp of how your own mind works
2. A deep understanding of other people’s thoughts and emotions
3. The art of connecting instantly and communicating brilliantly
In just under two hours, you’ll discover everything there is to know about becoming a socially confident introvert.
You’ll master social situations in an entirely new way that blasts through many of the psychological, interpersonal and communication challenges that hold most introverts back.
You’ll learn:
—How to bypass small talk and create conversations you actually enjoy with people you naturally click with.
—How to create and maintain friendly networks of people who’ll support rather than pressure, discourage or limit you.
—How to go outside of your comfort zone at an easy, manageable pace.
—How to avoid recklessly venturing into the “panic zone” that drives introverts back to square one.
—How to identify people you truly want to know rather than those you feel obligated to befriend, or who needn't matter.
—How to say “no” without being wracked by unnecessary guilt or shame.
—How to be authentically comfortable in any type of social situation.
—How to help others understand you better.


"TJ is a great communicator and teacher. The course is clear and covers all the essentials to make quick improvements in confidence. I would recommend for introverts as well as others whom want to make improvements in their conversational skills. Thanks TJ" - JENNA L, UDEMY STUDENT
"The teacher truly engages you to keep up with the content and the tips he gives throughout the course are incredibly useful and straight to the point. A lot to learn in just a few hours of content. Just an amazing course!" - SERGIO GUSTAVO SÁNCHEZ LINARES, UDEMY STUDENT


Consistent and reliable results
The program’s focus is on consistent and reliable results—not the boom-and-bust approach of too many fly-by-night personal-change gurus.
First off, you’ll get to understand how the introverted mind really works—so you can begin working with rather than against it.
Second, you’ll discover how to become more at ease in social situations by gaining a truer understanding of how others think, feel and function.
Finally, you’ll learn the three simple secrets to creating exactly the kind of conversations you want, enabling you effortlessly to bridge the gap between your mind and those of others.
Even just an intellectual understanding of the groundbreaking psychology TJ shares in this program could generate instant results for you.
However, combining this understanding with the simple tasks and techniques he recommends will likely lead to permanent and impressive changes faster than you imagined possible.
People already comfortable in their own skin may also benefit from taking this course—for instance, if they want to understand social psychology better, such as the differences between introvert and extrovert minds.


How often have you missed out on beautiful relationships because the self-talk in your mind held you back?
How many professional opportunities have you forfeited because somebody else used their talkativeness to steal all the attention?
How many conversations have drained you of energy simply because you didn’t know how to change them for the better?
After taking this course, you’ll likely never have to face any of those frustrating and debilitating scenarios ever again.


"This is not your average free course. It is packed with useful tips and strategies that I have already started to implement in my life. I can see how this will take me to the next level in my career too. I look forward to doing more of TJ's courses and based on this one have already purchased 2 more." - ALAN BROWN, UDEMY STUDENT
"TJ has a unique ability to teach in an engaging way, and his courses are structured so that the content becomes easy to understand and learn. This ensures that anyone taking his course will be in great hands." - LILLIAN RYDNING, PSYCHOLOGIST AND AUTHOR


This free program will also teach you:
Self-Mastery…
—How to manage and understand your emotions better than ever before.
—How to live in your “growth zone,” where true confidence is built.
—How to identify and eradicate forever that self-doubting, self-critical voice in your head.
—How to put the introvert’s “low-energy charisma” to best use.
—How to recharge your “social energy” more quickly and keep it in place for longer.


Interpersonal Mastery…
—How to boost your emotional intelligence for smoother interactions.
—The secret technique to understanding other people’s insecurities and self-talk.
—How to understand a person at a deep level the moment you meet them.


Communication Mastery…
—How to stop worrying about making a good impression, and what to do instead.
—Three powerful ingredients for creating the outcome you want in any conversation, whether social, romantic or professional.
—How to create an attractive personality and sparkling presence that makes people want to spend more time with you – without having to constantly be a high-energy person.
—How to go straight into conversations that you find interesting and enjoyable with almost anyone you meet.
—How to become comfortable taking the initiative and lead in conversations and relationships.


If you’re an introvert, the next two hours could forever alter the trajectory of your life. Start that journey today.


"I can't believe this is free! - I've got a lot to learn but have already learnt so much in this video course. Will be re-watching it many times and his other courses. The quality is very high and TJ is so likeable and a great instructor." - IAN GEDDES, UDEMY STUDENT
"It's exciting to know that I can become more social, I just need to work at it! I've been socially insecure since I was a kid and almost turning 25 I'm tired of constantly not knowing how to deal with social situations. Now I have a chance to change, thank you for this course!"  - NICOLE EASTER, UDEMY STUDENT
target_audience: Introverts
People interested in building confidence
People interested in improving social skills

courses.title: Inspiriert Reden: Ein Rhetorik-Kurs der anderen Art
courses.bio: Lerne frei, authentisch und selbstbewusst zu sprechen – zu jeder Zeit, über jedes Thema
objectives: Frei und selbstbewusst zu jedem Thema jederzeit sprechen können.
Die eigene Ausstrahlung und Präsenz erhöhen.
Die Kraft der Inspiration selbst gezielt erzeugen und nutzen.
Ohne Angst, sondern mit Gelassenheit präsentieren und vortragen.
Optimale Vorbereitung von Körper und Stimme für einen gelungenen Auftritt.
Gewinne die Aufmerksamkeit deiner Zuhörer und halte diese.
Authentizität und Selbstvertrauen in Vorträgen und Präsentationen.
Natürlichen Zugang zu deinem inspirierten Redefluss finden.

Einführung und Überblick: Vorstellung Verena: Lerne deine Trainerin kennen
Was ist inspiriertes Reden?: Die größten Herausforderungen beim freien Sprechen
WICHTIGE Übung: Dein Commitment an dich!
Was ist inspiriertes Reden? Mehr als nur Rhetorik!
Freies Sprechen: Das Problem und die Lösung
Das System Mensch: Reminder Card: Die Verbindung der 3 Ebenen als Karte zum Ausdrucken
Die 3 Schritte zum inspirierten Reden -: Präsenz – Teil 1 & 2: Der Schlüssel zu inspiriertem Reden
Übung zu Schritt 1: Der Goldene Faden - Präsenz steigern
Übung zu Schritt 1: Vorbereitung für deinen ersten kleinen Auftritt
Interaktive Aufwärmübung: Lass uns... Ma-Me-Mi-Mo-Mu... loslegen!
Übung zu Schritt 2: Fokus - lerne die Energie zu erzeugen und zu halten
Live-Übung nach vorbereitender Meditation: Philipps zweiter Vortrag
Verbindung – Den Spirit aktivieren und nutzen
Die erste Verbindung: Verbindung zu dir selbst
Die zweite Verbindung: Verbindung mit dem Spirit und darüber hinaus
Die dritte Verbindung: Verbindung zu deinem Publikum - Storytelling
Effektive Übung zum Storytelling: So wir: Abschlussübung zur Verbindung: Storytelling mit Praxisbeispiel von Philipp
Kontakt aufnehmen: So kannst du deine Fähigkeiten als Sprecher weiter verbessern
Fehler vermeiden, Quick-Tipp & coole Hac: Achtung Falle: Diese Sprech-Fehler solltest du vermeiden!
Grande Finale: Dein Auftritt mit WOW-Effekt - die 2 besten Tipps zum Schluss

requirements: Begeisterung und Offenheit für neue Methoden und Übungen.
Bereitschaft zu üben und jede Art von Erfolgen zu feiern.
Freude, die Kunst des inspirierten Redens auch für dich zu entdecken.
courses.description:
Für viele Menschen zählt die Angst, vor anderen frei zu sprechen, zu den größten Herausforderungen überhaupt. Vielleicht kennst auch du diese Gefühle von Nervosität, schlaflosen Nächten, Gedanken wie „Bin ich gut genug vorbereitet?“ oder die Sorge, den Faden zu verlieren. Doch stell dir vor, all das wäre nicht mehr nötig.

Was wäre, wenn du entdecken könntest, dass die Antworten bereits in dir sind? Dass du jeder Herausforderung mit Leichtigkeit begegnen kannst – sei es eine Präsentation, ein Vortrag oder ein spontanes Gespräch? Inspiriertes Reden bedeutet, mit Freude und Selbstvertrauen zu sprechen und dabei nicht nur Worte, sondern Emotionen und Kraft zu vermitteln.

Denn: Es geht nicht darum, perfekt vorbereitet zu sein. Es geht darum, jederzeit die richtigen Worte aus deiner echten, authentischen Energie heraus zu finden – aus der Quelle der Inspiration.
_______________________
In diesem Kurs mit Dr. Verena Thiem erwartet dich eine neue Art des Sprechens. Es geht nicht darum, perfekt zu sein oder starre Techniken auswendig zu lernen. Es geht darum, deine einzigartige Botschaft aus dir heraus entstehen zu lassen – frei, authentisch und voller Selbstvertrauen.

In drei effektiven Schritten lernst du, wie du mit gezielten Techniken und Übungen die Kraft der Inspiration entfachst, präsent bist und deine Zuhörer wirklich berührst. Lass uns gemeinsam auf eine Reise gehen, die nicht nur dein Sprechen, sondern auch dich selbst verändern wird.


Dieser Kurs ist für dich, wenn...
Du vor Präsentationen, Meetings oder Vorträgen oftmals nervös oder aufgeregt bist.
Du dich davor fürchtest, den roten Faden zu verlieren oder ein Blackout zu haben.
Du meinst, du müsstest für Präsentationen perfekt vorbereitet sein und dadurch übermäßig viel Aufwand in die Vorbereitungen steckst.
Du Schwierigkeiten hast, spontan zu reagieren oder dich präzise auszudrücken.
Du dir wünschst, vor anderen souverän, inspiriert und mit echter Freude aufzutreten.
Du endlich die Fähigkeit besitzen möchtest, nicht nur Fakten zu präsentieren, sondern wahre Emotionen und Begeisterung auszulösen.

Was du in diesem Kurs lernen wirst
Was inspiriertes Reden wirklich ist und warum es so kraftvoll ist.
Wie du die Quelle der Inspiration in dir aktivierst und in deinen Worten zum Ausdruck bringst.
Die drei effektiven Schritte zur Kunst des inspirierten Redens.
Wie du deine Präsenz und Strahlkraft erhöhst und dadurch einen Auftritt mit Wow-Effekt erzielst.
Die häufigsten Fehler, die du beim freien Sprechen vermeiden solltest.
Wie du Zuhörer berührst, sie inspirierst und ihnen langfristig in Erinnerung bleibst.
Erlebe wie du mit deiner authentischen Botschaft etwas wahrhaft großes bewirken kannst.


Unterstützende Materialien für deinen Erfolg
PDF-Unterlagen: Begleitmaterialien und Zusammenfassungen zu jedem Kapitel.
Selbstreflexions-Fragen: Nutze die vertiefenden Fragen zur Selbstreflexion und für deinen persönlichen Fortschritt.
Interaktive Übungen: Praktische, leicht umsetzbare Übungen, die dir helfen, deinen Fortschritt direkt zu spüren.
Meditation für Selbstvertrauen: Eine kraftvolle Meditation in der inspirierenden Atmosphäre eines 400 Jahre alten Weinkellers.
30-Tage-Challenge: Nutze diese Challenge, um inspiriertes Reden zur Gewohnheit zu machen – und das mit Freude und Leichtigkeit.
Inspiration an besonderen Orten: Lasse dich von den einzigartigen Locations des Seminarparadieses inspirieren und erhöhe dadurch deinen Lernerfolg.


Lasse dich ein auf eine Reise voller Magie!
Inspiriertes Reden ist mehr als nur eine Technik. Es ist ein Weg, wie du mit deinen Worten nicht nur andere, sondern auch dich selbst inspirieren kannst. Entdecke, wie diese Fähigkeit dir neue Türen öffnet, dir mehr Anerkennung und Wertschätzung bringt – und wie du dadurch stetig wachsen wirst.


Melde dich jetzt an und starte mit mir auf diese Reise der Inspiration.
Entdecken wir gemeinsam, wie inspiriertes Reden nicht nur einen Auftritt, sondern dein ganzes Leben verändern kann.
target_audience: Für Menschen, die mit ihrer Botschaft ihre Zuhörer begeistern und inspirieren möchten.
Für Menschen, die ihr Selbstvertrauen und ihre Präsenz beim freien Reden erhöhen wollen.
Für Anfänger, Fortgeschrittene, beruflich in jeder Position, ob Unternehmer oder angestellt - für alle, die mehr Magie auf die Bühne des Leben bringen möchten.

courses.title: Estética Capilar Básica: Home Care e Procedimentos
courses.bio: Home Care Capilar Básico
objectives: Fornecer conhecimentos sobre cuidados capilares em casa (home care)
Explicar a finalidade de diversos procedimentos de salão
Compreender a Importância dos cuidados capilares para a saúde e a aparência dos cabelos.
Compreender a estrutura do cabelo

Apresentação: Seja Bem vindo - Conhecendo as instrutoras
Mitos e Verdades Populares sobre Cuidado: Técnicas Caseiras que Não Devem Ser Feitas

requirements: Não é necessário ter conhecimento na área
courses.description:
Bem-vindo ao Curso Online de Estética Capilar, projetado especialmente para o público geral interessado em aprender sobre cuidados capilares em casa (home care) e entender a finalidade dos principais procedimentos realizados em salões de beleza. Este curso abrangente é dividido em cinco módulos que cobrem desde a estrutura básica do cabelo até técnicas específicas de cuidados.
No Módulo 1, você aprenderá sobre a estrutura do cabelo, tipos de cabelo e os principais problemas capilares, como queda de cabelo e oleosidade. O Módulo 2 focará na rotina de home care, ensinando como higienizar, hidratar e finalizar os cabelos corretamente, com recomendações de produtos acessíveis e eficazes.
O Módulo 3 aborda procedimentos capilares de salão, como alisamentos, colorações e tratamentos reconstrutores, explicando suas finalidades e os cuidados necessários pós-procedimento. No Módulo 4, você encontrará cuidados específicos para diferentes tipos de cabelo, como cacheados, crespos, quimicamente tratados e oleosos, com dicas práticas e produtos recomendados.
Como um bônus, o Módulo 5 desmistifica mitos populares sobre cuidados capilares e alerta contra técnicas caseiras que não devem ser feitas, como o uso de banana ou pasta de dente nos cabelos. Este módulo também inclui conselhos de profissionais para ajudar você a identificar informações confiáveis sobre cuidados capilares.
Com este curso, você adquirirá o conhecimento necessário para manter seus cabelos saudáveis e bonitos, entendendo os melhores produtos e práticas para suas necessidades específicas. Ao final, você estará preparado para cuidar dos seus cabelos de forma eficaz e segura, tanto em casa quanto em colaboração com profissionais.
target_audience: Público em geral que esteja interessado em cuidados capilares para a saúde e a aparência dos cabelos.

Aprenderás a CALCULAR el número de equilibrio.
Cómo INTERPRETAR todos los números de equilibrio.
Mejorarás tu AUTOCONOCIMIENTO.
Mejorar las RELACIONES.
Cómo ENTENDER al otro y a uno mismo a través del número de equilibrio.
Obtendrás una nueva HERRAMIENTA de crecimiento personal.

Qué significa y para qué sirve el número: Qué es el número de equilibrio
Para qué nos va a servir el número de equilibrio
Cómo CALCULAR el número de equilibrio: Cómo calcular el número de equilibrio
Cómo INTERPRETAR el número de equilibrio: Para qué interpretar el número de equilibrio
Kit de herramientas para el número de eq: MEDITACIÓN GUIADA, canalizada para tu bienestar y paz interior, y música 432 Hz.
ORACIÓN DE SANACIÓN de Ho'oponopono Oraciones, mantras y meditaciones (Curso 4)

requirements: Si lo que quieres es ser NUMEROLÓGO o aprender de CARTA NUMEROLÓGICA, se recomienda haber cursado los otros cursos de numerología del 1 al 5.
Puedes estudiarlos directamente, si lo que quieres es AUTOCONOCIMIENTO y MEJORA personal.
courses.description:
¡Bienvenido al Cuarto Nivel de Numerología!
Este curso es el siguiente paso en tu camino hacia la maestría en numerología. Es recomendable haber completado los tres niveles previos, disponibles en Udemy, antes de avanzar. Si tu meta es convertirte en un(a) numerólogo(a) profesional, sigue la secuencia de cursos en el orden indicado para obtener los mejores resultados.
La numerología es una herramienta maravillosa que nos permite descubrir quiénes somos, cuál es nuestro propósito y cómo alinearnos con nuestra misión de vida. Con este conocimiento, puedes identificar los momentos ideales para tomar decisiones importantes y aprovechar la energía de cada etapa para hacer cambios conscientes y significativos en tu vida.
En este curso, encontrarás una estructura organizada, fácil de aprender, aplicar y consultar tantas veces como lo necesites. Además, tendrás acceso ilimitado al contenido para repasar y profundizar en tu aprendizaje siempre que lo desees.
¿Qué te espera dentro del curso?
Técnicas avanzadas de numerología para comprender mejor tu vida y la de los demás.
Métodos prácticos para identificar vibraciones energéticas en momentos clave.
Herramientas para integrar la numerología en tu día a día y ayudar a otros.
Estoy aquí para responder todas tus dudas. Escríbeme si necesitas orientación o tienes alguna pregunta.
¡Te espero dentro!
Gracias, gracias, gracias por confiar en este camino.
Un fuerte abrazo,
Anna Arnal
target_audience: A todas aquellas personas que quieran CONOCERSE más y tener HERRAMIENTAS de CRECIMIENTO PERSONAL
A mis alumnos de los cursos anteriores, éste es el que sigue, ¡a por ello!

courses.title: 10X YÜKSEK ÖZGÜVEN: GERÇEK Özgüvene Sahip Olmanın Yolları
courses.bio: Yüksek Özgüven Nasıl Kazanılır: Gerçek Özgüvene Adım Adım - Başarı - Özgüven eksikliği - Karizma - İletişim - Beden Dili
objectives: Yüksek ve Sürdürülebilir Öz Güvene Sahip Olacaksınız
Öz Güven Eksikliğinden Bilimsel Tekniklerle Kurtulacaksınız
Etrafınızdaki Kişilere Güven Vereceksiniz
Defansif Olmaktansa Proaktif Olacaksınız
Harekete Hazır ve Dengeli Olacaksınız
Hayatın Önüne Koyduğu Zorluklarla Kolayca Başa Çıkacaksın

İNSAN İLİŞKİLERİ: İnsanların Senden Soğumasına Neden Olan 3 Detay

requirements: Ön koşul gerekli değildir.
courses.description:
Dünya genelinde HER ÜÇ KİŞİDEN BİRİ, özgüven eksikliği yaşamaktadır. Bu, başarıya ulaşma ve mutlu bir yaşam sürdürme konusunda ciddi bir engel oluşturmaktadır.


ÖZGÜVEN EKSİKLİĞİ, iş hayatında terfi almayı engeller, ilişkileri etkiler ve bireyin potansiyelini gerçekleştirmesini engeller. Bu durum, birçok kişinin yaşadığı ancak çoğunlukla çözüm bulamadığı bir acı noktadır.


"Yüksek Özgüven: Gerçek Özgüvene Sahip Olmanın Yolları" kursu, ÖZGÜVENİ GELİŞTİRMEK için adım adım bir rehber sunar. Kendinizi daha güçlü hissetmek, kendinize olan güveni artırmak ve hayatınızı istediğiniz yönde yönlendirmek için gereken araçları sunar.


Bu kursu tamamlayarak, İÇSEL GÜCÜNÜZÜ keşfedecek, başkalarıyla daha ETKİLİ İLETİŞİM kuracak ve hayatta İSTEDİĞİNİZ HEDEFLERE daha güvenle ilerleyeceksiniz.


Kursla ilgili birkaç önemli nokta:
Kişisel Gelişimde Adım Adım Yaklaşım
Pratik Teknikler ve Egzersizler
Özgüveni Güçlendirmenin Psikolojik İlkeleri
İletişim Becerilerini Geliştirme Stratejileri
Günlük Hayata Uygulanabilir Öneriler


Kurs, uzmanlar tarafından hazırlanmıştır ve kanıtlanmış yöntemleri içerir. Ayrıca, onlarca memnun öğrencinin geri bildirimlerine dayanır.
Öğrenci Referansı:
"Bu kurs, özgüvenimde inanılmaz bir fark yarattı. Şimdi daha cesur ve kendime daha çok güveniyorum."
"Kurs, benim için bir dönüm noktasıydı. Artık korkularımı yenmekte çok daha iyiyim ve hayattan daha fazla keyif alıyorum."
"Özgüven eksikliğim nedeniyle işimde sürekli geri plandaydım. Bu kurs sayesinde kendime olan güvenim arttı ve artık işimde daha başarılıyım."


Para İade Garantisi: Kurs, %100 memnuniyet garantisi ile sunulmaktadır. Eğer kurs sonucunda istediğiniz sonucu alamazsanız, paranızı geri alırsınız.


Kendinize olan güveninizi artırın ve hayatınızı istediğiniz şekilde yönlendirin! HEMEN KAYDOLUN ve gerçek özgüvene adım atın!


ÖZGÜVEN NEDİR?
Özgüven her durumda uygun ve etkili eylemlerde bulunabilme kabiliyetidir.
Özgüvenin iyi hissetmekle alakası yoktur.
Peki özgüvenli olmanın faydaları nelerdir?
Başkalarının zor olduğunu düşündükleri şeylerin üstesinden gelmenin ve bunları başarmanın mümkün olduğuna inanırsın.
Başkalarının gözünü korkutan iş ve projeleri, tek tek üstesinden gelebileceğin küçük parçalara ayırırsın.
Etrafındaki kişilere güven verirsin, paniklemelerini engellersin.




ÖZGÜVENLİ OLMAK NASILDIR?
Defansif olmaktansa proaktif yani atak davranırsın
Harekete hazır ve dengeli hissedersin
Bir amaç ya da eyleme planlı bir şekilde ilerlersin.
Rahat nefes alırsın.
Hayatın önüne koyduğu zorluklara karşı kendini güçlü hissedersin.
Kendine gülebilirsin.
Ne kadar sürerse sürsün, işlerin yoluna gireceğini bilirsin.
Bu kurs nasıl yüksek özgüven e sahip olacağın yönünde rehber niteliğindedir.
Daha fazla özgüven e yönelik teknikler ve bilgiler içermektedir.


DÜŞÜK ÖZ GÜVENİN YAŞAM ÜZERİNDEKİ ETKİLERİ NELERDİR?
Düşük özgüven hayatımızı her yönden etkiler.
Okul ve iş, kişisel ilişkiler, boş zamanda yapılan aktiviteler, kişisel bakım konuları üzerinde doğrudan etkindir.


1-Okul ve iş hayatındaki etkisi
Hata yapma korkusu nedeniyle düşük performans.
Zorluklardan kaçınma, her şeyi mükemmel yapmaya çalışma.


2-Kişisel İlişkiler
Şiddetli düzeyde kendini test etme dürtüsü.
Yüksek ölçüde onaylanma ihtiyacı.
Başkalarını hoşnut etmek için gereğinden fazla çaba gösterme.
Kendilerini yetersiz hissetme gibi durumlar.


3-Boş Zaman Aktiviteleri
Rekabet içerikli aktivitelerden kaçınmak.
Ödülü, iyi davranılmayı, hoş vakit geçirmeyi hak etmediğini düşünme durumu.


4-Kişisel Bakım
Kendilerine özen göstermeme.
Fazla içki ve sigara tüketimi.
Kişisel sağlık ihmalleri dişçiye gitmek, hastalığı olmasına rağmen hastaneye gitmemek gibi.
Ya da tam tersi başkalarını etkilemenin tek yolunun dış görünüşleri olduğunu düşündükleri için,
Görünüşlerinin her ayrıntısını mükemmelleştirmek için saatlerce uğraşmak.
Düşük özgüven hayatımızı bu ve benzeri birçok yönden etkileyebilir.


Kursla Bağlantılı Diğer Başlıklar:
Özgüven eksikliği nasıl giderilir?
Öz güven eksikliği nasıl anlaşılır?
Özgüveni yükseltmek için ne yapmalı?
Özgüvenim yok ne yapmam gerekiyor?
Psikolojik özgüven nasıl kazanılır?
Özgüven sonradan kazanılabilir mi?
Özgüven eksikliği tedavi edilmezse ne olur?
Özgüven eksikliği hangi hormon?
Özgüvenin kaynağı nedir?
Kendine güvenen biri nasıl olur?
Özgüven genetik mi?
Özgüven için hangi kitaplar okunmalı?
Özgüveni ne düşürür?
Özgüven patlaması ne anlama gelir?
Spor yapmak özgüveni artırır mı?
Özgüven ve özsaygı nasıl kazanılır?
Ergenlerde özgüven eksikliği nasıl giderilir?
Özgüven nedir ve nasıl kazanılır?
Özgüven nedir örnek?
Aşırı özgüven ne demek?
target_audience: Öz Güven Eksikliğinden Kurtulmak İsteyenler
Kendilerini Yetersiz Hissedenler
Yüksek Ölçüde Onaylanma İhtiyacı Duyanlar
Hata Yapmaktan Korkanlar
Normal Seviyedeki Öz Güvenlerini Daha Da Artırmak İsteyenler

courses.title: Booster Votre Confiance En Soi En Diminuant Vos Peurs
courses.bio: Réduisez vos peurs et stress pour booster sa confiance en soi. Peurs sociales, peur du succès, peur du rejet, etc
objectives: Gérer la peur du rejet
Gérer la peur de l'échec
Gérer la peur du succès
Gérer la peur de ce que pensent les autres
Diminuer votre peur d'approcher les autres
Transformer vos problèmes en opportunités
Gérer votre peur que vous n'êtes pas assez bien
Et bien plus encore

Bienvenue + ce que vous allez apprendre: Bienvenue + ce que vous allez apprendre
Comment gérer la peur de l'échec et du s: Comment gérer la peur de l’échec
Comment gérer la peur du succès
Comment gérer vos peurs sociales: Comment gérer la peur de ce que pensent les autres
Comment gérer la peur du rejet/ne pas être aimé
Comment diminuer la peur d’approcher les autres
Comment gérer votre stress et vos problè: Comment transformer vos problèmes en opportunités
Comment diminuer votre stress au quotidien
Comment gérer la peur de ne pas être assez bien

requirements: Aucune connaissance préalable n'est requise car il s'agit d'un cours de développement personnel.
courses.description:
Voulez-vous apprendre comment gérer vos peurs pour accomplir vos objectifs personnels et professionnels?
Dans cette formation en ligne courte et intense, je vais vous apprendre à gérer vos principales peurs et à les surmonter.
Obtenez des techniques simples et pratiques pour faire face à vos peurs quotidiennes grâce à ce cours pour gérer vos peurs en ligne !
Tout le monde a des peurs qui les empêchent d'accomplir ce qu'ils veulent.
Accompagné de l'Expert en développement personnel Alain Wolf, vous apprendrez dans ce cours sur les peurs en ligne à gérer et diminuer l’impact de vos peurs sur votre quotidien. Peur de l’approche, peur du rejet, peur de ce que pensent les autres, peur de ne pas être aimé, peur de ne pas être assez bien, peur de l’échec... Vous aurez toutes les clés pour diminuer vos peurs et accomplir tous vos objectifs ! En développant ces techniques de gestion de vos peurs, vous augmenterez votre bien-être et votre succès.
Ce cours vous apprendra à détruire ces peurs :
La peur de l'échec
La peur du succès
Peur de ce que les gens pensent de vous
Peur du rejet/de ne pas être aimé(e)
Peur d'approcher quelqu'un
Transformez vos problèmes en opportunités
Et bien plus encore !


Ce cours est fait pour vous si vous souhaitez obtenir des outils pratiques pour gérer vos peurs au quotidien.


Allez-y, inscrivez-vous à ce cours maintenant!
target_audience: Les personnes qui souhaitent surmonter leurs principales peurs
Les personnes qui ont l'impression que quelque chose les retient
Les personnes qui souhaitent en savoir plus sur les principales peurs des gens

courses.title: Change-Management: Blockaden lösen, Wandel erleben
courses.bio: Der Kompakt-Kurs zur Überwindung individueller, versteckter Widerstände
objectives: Nach dem Kurs erkennen Sie Ihre verborgenen Widerstände gegen Veränderung.
Sie erstellen eine eigene Immunitätslandkarte zur Aufdeckung innerer Barrieren.
Sie entwickeln Strategien, um innere Blockaden gezielt Schritt für Schritt abzubauen.
Sie wenden Erkenntnisse sicher auf persönliche Ziele und Gruppenprozesse an.
Sie können das Konzept in der Arbeit mit anderen nutzen

Immunity to Change - Widerstand gegenübe: Ihre "schreckliche Phantasie" über die Folgen einer Veränderung
Ihre Landkarte der Hindernisse: Zeichnen Sie die Landkarte - Ein Arbeitsblatt
Veränderung Jetzt!: Ab ins kalte Wasser. Aber SMART!

requirements: Keine
courses.description:
Fühlen Sie sich manchmal wie in einer Sackgasse, obwohl Sie genau wissen, dass Sie sich eigentlich verändern möchten? Kommen Ihnen immer wieder dieselben inneren Widerstände in die Quere, ohne dass Sie genau verstehen, warum das so ist? Dann könnte dieser Kompaktkurs genau der richtige Einstieg für Sie sein. Auf Basis des renommierten ‚Immunity to Change‘-Konzepts lernen Sie, Ihre verborgenen Blockaden zu erkennen, zu verstehen und schrittweise aufzulösen. Wir gehen dabei direkt ans Eingemachte – Sie erhalten einen schnellen Überblick über die zentralen Ideen und Methoden, sodass Sie rasch ein Gefühl dafür bekommen, worum es wirklich geht.


Gleichzeitig ist es wichtig zu verstehen, dass echte Veränderung selten über Nacht geschieht. Auch wenn der Kurs als Kompaktangebot gestaltet ist und Sie die wesentlichen Inhalte zügig erfassen können, ist die Auseinandersetzung mit Ihren eigenen inneren Mustern ein Prozess, der Zeit und Geduld erfordert. Es handelt sich dabei nicht um eine magische Formel, mit der sich alle Probleme auf Knopfdruck lösen lassen. Stattdessen bekommen Sie praktische Werkzeuge an die Hand, um schrittweise Veränderungen anzugehen. Die Übungen und Methoden zielen darauf ab, bewusste wie unbewusste Faktoren ans Licht zu bringen, die Sie bisher möglicherweise ausgebremst haben.


Dieser Kurs ist kein Ersatz für eine medizinische, psychologische oder psychotherapeutische Behandlung. Sollten Sie anhaltende, schwerwiegende oder belastende psychische Probleme haben, wenden Sie sich bitte an entsprechend qualifiziertes Fachpersonal. Veränderungsprozesse können auf tiefere Ursachen zurückgehen, die nicht allein durch diesen Kurs lösbar sind. Das hier vermittelte Wissen kann Ihnen jedoch dabei helfen, Ihre Situation klarer zu sehen und neue Perspektiven auf Ihre persönlichen Herausforderungen zu gewinnen.


Wenn Sie bereit sind, einen ersten Schritt zu gehen, um Ihre eigenen Verhaltensmuster besser zu verstehen und langfristig neue Wege einzuschlagen, dann ist dieser Kurs eine ausgezeichnete Gelegenheit. Starten Sie Ihre persönliche Entdeckungsreise und erleben Sie, wie Sie die Grundlagen für nachhaltige Veränderungen in Ihrem Leben legen können.
target_audience: Personen die von Veränderungsprozessen betroffen sind.
Personen, die sich eigentlich verändern möchten, aber eine Blockade verspüren, die sie daran hindert in die Veränderung zu gehen.
Personen, die im beruflichen Kontext mit anderen arbeiten, die sich verändern müssen.
Coaches, die das Konzept nutzen wollen, um mit Ihren Coachees zu arbeiten

courses.title: 心理学を使って劣等感、無力感を無限のモチベーションに変換する方法：心の取扱説明書：カウンセリング講座３.２
courses.bio: 心に強いも弱いもない。問題行動を起こす人も、偉人も精神構造は同じです。違いは心のエネルギーをどこに向けているかだけです。心理学を使って、なぜあの人はあぁなんだろう？そしてどうすればいいのかを学びましょう。マーキング理論を学びましょう
objectives: モチベーションを自在にコントロールする方法を学んでいきます。
行き詰まった時に自分をコントロールし、無限のモチベーションに変換する方法を学びます。
問題行動を起こす人、依存に走る人の精神構造と対処の方法が心理学的に分かるようになります。
１０万年ほど進化していない人類が、それでもこの現代社会で幸せに生きる方法を学んでいきます。
Change理論３「マーキング理論」について学んでいきます。

人の生きる目的と人の心の構造について: 偉人もあなたも精神構造は全く同じです
人の生きる目的とネットでの炎上の関係について
幸せに生きる唯一の方法: 劣等感、無力感、欠乏感こそが人生の宝
幸せに成功する唯一の方法
最も安全に生きる方法と劣等感について: 問題行動を起こす人の心の内側を知る
Change理論の知識と技術で自分を動かし無限のモチベーションを手に入れる方法
自分を動かす方法: 飽き性こそ天才のあかし。もっと飽きて下さい。
人生相談/自己愛が強く暴言を吐く友人がいます

requirements: 人と人の心に興味があれば、特別な知識や条件や道具も必要ありません。
courses.description:
人はなぜ問題行動を起こすのか？無限のモチベーションを作り出す方法について、心理カウンセラーの片田智也さんとChange代表であり元格闘家の映画監督小楠健志（おぐすけんじ）とで対談形式でお伝えしています。


心に強いも弱いもありません。
無限のモチベーションを作る方法は誰でもできます。
知識と技術と練習で誰でもできるようになります。
その前提としてこんなことをお伝えしていきます。


・人の生きる目的。
・無意識と意識について。
・間違った幸せの定義について。
・幸せはどこにあるのか？
・人はなぜ消費活動に走るのか？
・不快感を消す方法
・現代は精神的飢餓の時代
・脳とドーパミンの関係について
・なぜ人は何もないと助け合い、全てあると助け合わないのか？
・甘えと反抗期について
・何が起きても劣等感をモチベーションに変える
・最も安全に生きる方法


この講座はChange理論その３「マーキング理論」に基づいてお話をしています。
この講座に関連する講座は「カウンセラー養成講座、無限のモチベーションを生み出す方法」と「無限のモチベーションを生み出す心理学講座」です。
無料で見られるところもたくさんありますので、そちらもぜひ、のぞいていただけたらと思います。
それでは、講座でお会いしましょう！！


ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
講師のプロフィール


The change 代表 小楠 健志（おぐすけんじ）
■映画監督
■ NPO法人ジコサポ日本創始者
■元総合格闘技修斗世界２位
■ブラジリアン柔術アジア大会優勝
・著書２６冊
・治療家でもある
日本にメンタルのインフラを構築すべく「The Change」を片田智也氏と共に創設し活動をしている。


ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー


The change グランドトレーナー 片田 智也
■心理カウンセラー
■キャリアコンサルタント


家庭用品のメーカーで営業を経験後、ベンチャー企業の経営企画室で事業開発、運営管理に携わる。20代半ばで独立。
ストレスから急性の緑内障を発症し、視覚障害者となる。目が不自由であるハンディを克服できず、強烈な劣等感と自信喪失を味わう。解決策を得るため自分自身を実験台にし、心理的な回復や成長に関する知識や技術を研究。
うつ病による姉の自死をきっかけに心理職へと転身。現在はメンタルヘルス研修講師、心理カウンセラーとして活動する。
心理的な回復に関する体系的かつ有効な仕組みが存在しないという問題を解決するため、小楠健志とともに"The Change プログラム"の開発に取り組む、自治体こころの健康相談や厚生労働省ストレスチェック制度の心理相談など過去のべ5,000名以上のカウンセリングを担当。
KDDIグループ、LEC東京リーガルマインド、ヒューマンホールディングス、SMBCコンサルティングなど企業における研修登壇多数。
日本交流分析協会認定 交流分析士

target_audience: 心理学とモチベーション、やる気の関係と実践の方法を学びたい人。

courses.title: Rewrite Your Story After Narcissistic Abuse in Relationships
courses.bio: How to Write and Release Your Toxic Relationship Story, and Rewrite Your New Future Story
requirements: No prerequisites. Just come to class with an open mind and willing to learn something new.
courses.description:
Have you been mentally and emotionally abused and manipulated by a toxic narcissist? Have you had enough of the gaslighting, the flying monkeys, the love-bombing and the hoovering?
Are you tired of accepting the "you" that the narcissist has defined? Are you ready to finally DEFINE YOURSELF? Want to make your own choices about who you are and what your life looks like?
If you're ready to rediscover yourself again after narcissistic abuse, this course presents and easy and simple way to do just that.
You'll learn to identify your abuse story, write it out and then release it. Plus, you'll get a step-by-step plan to write your new future story - one that you can use to create the life you truly desire, and to become the person you've always wanted to be.
You don't have to accept the story your narcissist put in place - you get to write your OWN story.
This course offers you the solution you need, and it's been created specifically for you by a certified life coach, author and survivor of narcissistic abuse.
Inside, you'll find several reports, worksheets and downloadable tools that will help you to take the steps necessary to get your story down, release it and write your new story.
Take the time to study the material, do the meditation and the writing exercises, and you'll be on your way to making things go your way - and to creating the self and the life that you truly want.
target_audience: This course is meant for people who have survived toxic relationships with narcissists or people with NPD or BPD.
This course is not for you if you are currently experiencing physical or sexual abuse. In that case, get out and get help before returning to take this course.

objectives: Kişisel Gelişim Nedir

requirements: Kendini geliştirmeye istekli
courses.description:
Selam arkadaşlar hepiniz eğitimime hoşgeldiniz.
Peki bu eğitimde sizleri ne bekliyor
Kişisel Gelişim Nedir dersimizde başarmadan mutlu olunamaz algısını yeneceğiz ve hatalarımızdan bile mutlu olmayı öğreneceğiz bunun bir yol ve mutlu bir şekilde gidilmesi gerektiğini göreceğiz.


Kendini Anla dersimizde kendimizi nasıl anlarız ve anladığımızda ne olur bunu işleyeceğiz hani klasik tır ya kendimi anlıyorum ama mutsuzum ve depresifim sözünün kendimizi anlamadığımızdan kaynaklandığını göreceğiz.


Mantık mı Duygular mı dersinde kararlarımızı almamızın altındaki mantıksal ve duygusal süreci işleyeceğiz. Ve aslında hep karar sandığımız diyet yapacağım,kilo vereceğim, spor yapacağım, para kazanacağım, hayatımı düzene sokacağım gibi karar olduğunu sandığımız şeylerin neden uygulanamayıp 3 gün sonra bıraktığımızı öğreneceğiz.


Son olarak da artık bir karar vereceğiz ve hayatımız renklenecek çünkü artık karar vermenizin önündeki engeller kalkmış olacak.


Bu eğitimden maximum verimi alabilmek için YouTube kanalıma abone olun ve orada eğitime tamamlayıcı olarak attığım videoları izleyin buna artı olarak eğitimi 3 5 10 defa izleyin ki özümseyebilesiniz ardından sadece uygulamak kalıyor uygulamazsanız sadece kahve sohbeti olur uygularsanız hayatınız değişir.


Bu eğitim başlangıç seviyesi içindir ve bu eğitimin devamı gelecektir. Ama aklınızda soru işareti olmasın bu eğitim de başlangıç için gayet uygundur ve eğitimde söylediğim kıvılcım etkisini yapar ve en sonunda mutluluk yolunda ilk adımı atmış olursunuz.


Şunu da eklemek istiyorum ki bir insanın hayatını hiçbir eğitim hiçbir kitap değiştiremez eğer kişi değişmek isterse sadece yardımcı olabilir burda olduğunuza göre bunu istiyorsunuz ama uygulamak çok önemli hemde çok


Umarım bu eğitim sizin hayatınızı renklendirir benim hayatımı renklendirmişti .
target_audience: Kişisel Gelişime önem veren insanlara

You’ll also get to know how the Positive Affirmations works and how you can use them for yourself.
To learn all the aspects of Confidence in detail which enables you to fit in Workplace, in Society, or in your Relationships too.

Introduction: Where Does Our Self-Confidence Come From?

requirements: An Open Mind and Commitment

courses.description:
Unleash Your Inner Light: Rebuild Self-Confidence for a Fulfilling Life
Greetings! Your self-confidence is like a shining star in the darkest night. It's an inner light that remains radiant, regardless of external circumstances.
Consider the Zen saying: "What was your Original Face before you were born?"
At birth, our self-confidence is inherent and untouched. However, as we journey through childhood, it often diminishes. Each failure, mistake, guilt, or moment of self-neglect chips away at our confidence, making us feel fragmented and incomplete as adults.
But here's the truth: You are already whole and complete, even with your perceived imperfections and broken parts. All you need to do is gather your pieces and become whole once again. Reflect on your life, and you may initially recall regrets and sad times.
Do you see the fragments of yourself scattered along your life's path? Those moments where you felt inadequate or faced criticism and blame from others? Take a moment to also acknowledge the memories of triumphs, when you felt amazing and accomplished, proving what a wonderful human being you truly are.
Loving and honouring yourself is your birthright. The good news is that you can reclaim what is rightfully yours: self-confidence.
It is never too late to cultivate self-confidence. You can start right now! Self-confidence has a profound impact on how we enjoy life, how we respect others, and how we appreciate life's wonders. Practice the techniques we provide you every single day, and witness the miracles they manifest in your life.
Become the best version of yourself, and treat yourself with the utmost care. You deserve it!
target_audience: Anyone who wants to increase their level of confidence
Those who want to take their social skills to the next level
Anybody who desires to rapidly build a high level of Confidence and Self Esteem.
People who struggle with low self-esteem, anxiety and feeling of not being good enough

courses.title: The Empowered Menopause Workshop
courses.bio: Create your vision of an empowered menopause then design the journey to make your vision a reality.

Welcome: Welcome to the Empowered Menopause Workshop
Introduction: Introduction, Menopause statistics and your hormone journey
Protecting our Future Health: Time for a change of strategy
Stress and its roll in the menopause jou: Stress and its role in menopause

requirements: An open mind to experience an empowering response to menopause.
courses.description:
How do you feel about menopause?
There is a massive lack of knowledge and understanding about this completely natural time of our lives that leaves women feeling unsupported, anxious and like they are going to lose themselves, and who they are forever.
My mission is to reach as many women as I can to empower them to decide what they want their menopause to look like if they were truly thriving in life.
Due to so much conflicting information about what a healthy lifestyle actually is, women can get caught in a spiral or restrictive dieting and over-exercising in trying to overcome menopause symptoms which they feel are just a lack of health.
This is certainly not the case.
Many of the strategies women over 40 use to try and maintain their health and well-being are actually working against them.
In this workshop you will gain understanding and clarity about what is going on in the body during menopause and how this can affect your symptoms.
The workshop:
You wouldn't set out on a long turbulent journey without knowing your destination and plotting your course.
Creating a vision statement is visualising your ideal life if anything was possible and life had no limitations.
Once you know where you want to get to you can start designing your lifestyle roadmap to get there.
Menopause is an ideal time in our life to take a pause, some time for reflection and decide from all we have learned about life so far what we want to do and achieve with the rest of our lives post-menopause.
By deciding what is important to us and our non-negotiables we can create a journey in alignment with how we want to live.  This relieves stress and creates room for happiness and harmony.
Join me on the first step to creating your empowered menopause, I can't wait to support you.
target_audience: This course is for women wanting to take control of their menopause journey (or wanting to get prepared for it).  This workshop is also great for post-menopausal women who want to discover their true purpose so they can make the most out of the beginning of the rest of their amazing life.

objectives: Individuare i tuoi blocchi limitanti

File pdf di affermazioni di supporto alle pratiche di mindset

requirements: Non è richiesta alcuna esperienza o requisiti particolare. Imparerai tutto all'interno della lezione
courses.description:
Masterclass: LEVEL-UP YOUR MINDSET  -  equilibrio vita-lavoro per principianti


Quante volte ti senti frustrata perché non riesci a gestire le mille difficoltà che incontri nel tuo business online?
Quanto può bloccare la tua creatività il pensiero costante di dover creare sempre contenuti che possano attirare l'attenzione del tuo audience?
Quanto fatichi a comunicare nei social il tuo business?
Quanto ti spaventa dover iniziare ad attuare e/o pubblicare contenuti di vendita del tuo servizio unico e di valore?


Se queste situazioni ti risuonano nel tuo inconscio, mia imprenditrice meravigliosa, sei nel posto giusto.


In questa masterclass di oltre 2 ore, affronteremo le origini delle tue paure e delle tue insicurezze più radicate trasformandole in azioni potenzianti per sviluppare un mindset di crescita.
Ossia, quella mentalità di miglioramento che ti permetterà di acquisire maggiore fiducia in te stessa e consapevolezza del tuo valore immenso!
Nello specifico vedremo:


individuazione dei blocchi limitanti
come sconfiggerli
riprogrammazione mentale
pratiche di mindset (che io stessa ho utilizzato)
visione del tuo essere (nel business)


Assieme alla registrazione della masterclass, riceverai il workbook pratico con tutti gli esercizi che ti consiglio di fare una volta finita la lezione. Al suo interno troverai una prima parte di introspezione, una parte di pratiche di mindset e la parte finale di monitoraggio dei progressi.

LEVEL-UP YOUR MINDSET  -  equilibrio vita-lavoro per principianti, fa per te se:

sei una libera professionista e imprenditrice con P.I. bloccata nei contenuti e nella vendita del tuo servizio high-ticket

sei una networker che ogni giorno affronta muri di obiezioni sull'attività del network marketing da potenziali clienti ideali, da amici e parenti

sei hai il forte desiderio di crescere e migliorarti ogni singolo giorno per viverti meglio la tua vita e saper affrontare le difficoltà traendone sempre una lezione positiva potentissima


LEVEL-UP YOUR MINDSET  -  equilibrio vita-lavoro per principianti, non fa per te se:


sei una donna che ha ancora troppi pregiudizi radicati sul mindset
sei convinta che il mindset sia una moda
credi che il mindset sia una questione di riti magici ecc.
non sei disposta a cambiare la tua vita. e il tuo business
hai paura di toccare la chiave della tua vita di abbondanza


Se rientri nel primo gruppo, puoi proseguire e assieme alla lezione della durata di oltre 2 ore avrai diritto al materiale allegato:


registrazione masterclass a vita
workbook pratico + file affermazioni positive da associare alle pratiche di mindset del workbook


Capitoli della lezione:


Conosci la tua mente
Individua i tuoi blocchi limitati
Come distruggere i tuoi pensieri limitanti
Riprogramma la tua mente
Pratiche di mindset
Visione de 'Ero - Sono - Sarò'


In conclusione, questa lezione ti fornirà un piano d'azione da compiere step by step costantemente. Se prima non migliori il tuo mindset come persona, non potrai passare ad un mindset imprenditoriale solido. Questo perché la vendita è questione di tecnica unita ad una forza interiore solida, inattaccabile, sicura e grande fiducia in se stessi.
target_audience: Sviluppare e migliorare una mentalità di crescita e positiva

courses.title: From Lonely to Loved: Building Your Circle of Friends
courses.bio: Overcome loneliness by learning how to connect and build lasting relationships

The 3 Step Process: Finding Future Friends: Breaking the Ice
Cultivating Your Relationships: Friendships That Last

requirements: No prior experience or specific skills are required. This course is designed for anyone looking to improve their social skills and build genuine friendships
courses.description:
Dear Friend,
Are you tired of feeling isolated and longing for genuine connections? Imagine transforming your social life from lonely to loved—where making friends becomes natural and enjoyable. Introducing "From Lonely to Loved: Building Your Circle of Friends," your comprehensive guide to mastering the art of friendship.
In this transformative course, you'll uncover the psychology behind friendship formation and learn practical strategies to initiate and maintain meaningful connections. Whether you're new in town, navigating a life transition, or simply seeking to expand your social circle, this course is designed for you.
What You'll Learn:
Psychology of Friendship: Understand the importance of friendships for your well-being and personal growth.
Overcoming Barriers: Identify and overcome personal barriers that may hinder your ability to connect with others.
Effective Communication: Learn proven techniques for initiating conversations and fostering deep, meaningful friendships.
Building Confidence: Develop the confidence to navigate social settings and expand your social network effortlessly.
Nurturing Relationships: Discover how to nurture and sustain friendships over time, fostering a supportive network.
How to identify and approach potential friends
Techniques to start and maintain engaging conversations
Strategies to build trust and deepen your connections
How to overcome loneliness and build a fulfilling social life
Gain confidence in social interactions
Create meaningful relationships that support and uplift you


Why Choose This Course?
This isn't just another self-help program. It's a personalized journey designed to empower you with practical skills and insights you can apply immediately. I share stories, examples, and easy to follow principles that you can immediately adopt and integrate into your life in order to help you spark new conversations with former strangers, build connections, and turn those into long-term meaningful relationships.
Who Should Enroll?
If you're ready to break free from loneliness and build genuine, lasting friendships, this course is for you. Whether you're introverted, new to an area, or simply looking to enrich your social experiences, "From Lonely to Loved" offers invaluable strategies to help you thrive socially.
Enroll Today and Start Your Journey!
Join many others who have transformed their lives through these empowering techniques. Don't let another day go by feeling isolated—take the first step towards a more connected, fulfilling social life.
Enrollment is open now. Sign up today to secure your spot and begin your journey from lonely to loved today!


But this won't work for me...
You might be thinking things like:
"I’m too shy and introverted to make new friends."
or
"I’ve tried making friends before and it didn’t work."
or
"I don’t know where to start."


We'll you'll be happy to know this course is designed with introverts in mind. As a fellow introvert, I know how difficult it can be to make new relationships when we only have a certain amount of emotional energy available to spend on meeting new people and connecting with loved ones. That's why you’ll learn practical, step-by-step techniques to build your confidence and start conversations comfortably without feeling too taxed or overwhelmed.


I am to provide efficient methods to integrate friend-making into your daily routine, ensuring you can build meaningful relationships without disrupting your schedule. The strategies in this course are proven and have helped many people like you overcome past challenges. You'll learn new techniques that you haven't tried before, that seem so simple they will start to come easily to you with just a little bit of practice.


Success Stories:
"This course really helped me come out of my shell! I now have a group of friends who truly understand me." – Sarah
"I was able to make new friends quickly and easily with the techniques taught in this course." – John
Don’t let loneliness hold you back any longer. Enroll in “From Lonely to Loved: Building Your Circle of Friends” today and take the first step towards a happier, more connected life!


Here's to building a circle of friends who enrich your life
Warm regards,

Jay
target_audience: Anyone feeling isolated or struggling to expand their social circle
Someone who wants to make new friends but doesn't know where to start

courses.description:
"İnsanlarla dolu bir odada mı olmak isterdiniz, yoksa yılanlarla dolu bir odada mı?", diye sorulduğunda, pek çok insan yılanları tercih etmiştir. Bazı insanlar için göz önünde olmak, tam anlamıyla bir kabus gibidir.
Sosyal Fobi ve Özgüven Eksikliği, bu konuda sıkıntı yaşayan insanlar için, hayatta mücadele edilmesi gereken en büyük problemdir. Çünkü sosyal fobi, insanın potansiyel gücünü elinden alır ve yeteneklerini açığa çıkarmasına engel olur.
Pek çok insan özgüven eksikliği problemini çözemediği için, normalde yapabileceğinden çok daha azına razı olur.
İkili ilişkilerden sosyal ilişkilere, iş yaşamından özel yaşama kadar neredeyse hayatımızda etkilemediği ve dokunmadığı alan yoktur.
Sosyal fobinin; genetik, psikolojik ve çevresel pekçok nedeni ve tetikleyicisi vardır.
Elbette bir gecede sihirli bir değnek dokunuşuyla bu problemi çözmek mümkün değildir. Ancak adım adım uygulanacak bir takım yönergelerle, eyleme geçmekle, düşünce, duygu ve davranışlarını kontrol etmekle ve hepsinden önemlisi kararlı bir tutumla, bu sorunla baş edebilmek çoğu durumda mümkündür.
Genel anlamda üzerinden geçeceğimiz başlıklar şunlar olacak?


Sosyal Fobi Nedir?
Sosyal Fobi ve Utangaçlık Kavramları
Sosyal Fobinin Tetikleyicileri
Sosyal Fobinin Nedenleri
Sosyal Fobinin Etkileri
Sosyal Fobi Türleri
Sosyal Fobinin Belirtileri
Sosyal Fobi ile Baş Etme Becerileri
Bu kursta sosyal fobi ve özgüven eksikliği konularında kendi kendine yardım edebilmek için gerekli teorik ve pratik bilgileri bulabilirsiniz.
Elbette sosyal fobi hayatınızı bütünüyle kontrol altına aldı ise ve bu konuda bir terapi desteğine ihtiyacınız olduğunu düşünüyorsanız, mutlaka bir profesyonel destek almalısınız. Çünkü bu kurs size bir farkındalık ve kendini geliştirme araçları sunacaktır ama bir tedavi ve terapinin yerini asla tutmaz. Devam eden bir profesyonel destek sürecinize katkı sağlayabilir ya da bu konuda farkındalık kazandırabilir ama bir terapi ya da tedavi iddiası taşımaz.
target_audience: Sosyal fobi ve özgüven eksikliği ile mücadele eden,
Özgüvenini geliştirmek isteyen,
Sosyal ilişkilerde kendine güven duymak isteyen,
Utangaçlık ve içe kapanma sorunları ile baş etmek isteyen herkes bu eğitimden fayda sağlayabilir.

requirements: Nie musisz nic umieć - wszystkiego dowiesz się z kursu :)
courses.description:
Kurs składa się z mini-lekcji, a lekcje tworzą moduły. Zapoznaj się z ich treścią.
MODUŁ 1 TWOJE KORZYŚCI
poznasz zasady rządzące kursem
usłyszysz o korzyściach z pewności siebie
poznasz definicję pewności siebie
stworzysz swoją własną listę korzyści z większej pewności siebie
MODUŁ 2 AUTODIAGNOZA
ocenisz, na jakim poziomie jest Twoja pewność siebie
zobaczysz, z jakiego punktu startujesz
będę Ci pokazywać też Twoje mocne strony - każdy je ma!
MODUŁ 3 SAMOOCENA
będziesz pracować nad wzmocnieniem samooceny
rozwiniesz wiarę w siebie
dowiesz się, co Cię wspiera
co lubisz, co Cię wzmacnia
i dlaczego to ważne w budowaniu pewności siebie
MODUŁ 4 - POCZUCIE WŁASNEJ SKUTECZNOŚCI
wzmocnisz poczucie własnej skuteczności
będziesz uczyć sie o tym, dlaczego lepiej mieć je wyższe
ale też jak to zrobić, aby wzrosło


MODUŁ 5 - WEŹ ODPOWIEDZIALNOŚĆ
będziesz ćwiczyła aktywną postawę
przechodzenie do działania
branie odpowiedzialności za to, jaka jest Twoja pewność siebie.
MODUŁ 6 - PROCES
będziesz uczyła się o tym, że pewność siebie to proces
opracujesz plan wzmacniania pewności siebie na następny rok - tak, tak - praca nad pewnością siebie nie kończy się wraz z ukończeniem kursu
KTO PROWADZI KURS


MARIA ŁUCJAN PSYCHOLOG
Mam na imię Maria Łucjan i jestem psychologiem. Na codzień pracuję on-line i w gabinecie prowadząc poradnictwo psychologiczne dla Kobiet. Uwielbiam pracować z kobietami - pracujemy nad pewnością siebie, samooceną, przekonaniami, osiąganiem swoich celów. Pracuję też z lękami, obniżonym nastrojem. Sprawiam, że moim klientkom żyje się lepiej, że ich komfort życia się poprawia.

Postanowiłam opracować najważniejsze rzeczy w formie kursu on-line, który będzie dostępny dla Kobiet wtedy, kiedy tego potrzebują.
KARTY PRACY I ĆWICZENIA PRAKTYCZNE
Ważną częścią kursu są karty pracy. Karty pracy otrzymujesz w formacie PDF (są piękne!) drukujesz je przed rozpoczęciem pracy z kursem, a później jeśli w lekcji jest ćwiczenie z kartą pracy zapisujesz swoje odpowiedzi właśnie tam.
target_audience: Osoby chcące poprawić pewność siebie

Aqui vai encontrar tudo o que precisa para começar a construir uma Autoestima inabalável, que nada nem ninguém será capaz de destruir. Dê uma vista de olhos nos módulos, nas aulas abertas e depois de fazer o curso, conte-me como foram as mudanças incríveis que conseguiu atingir!

courses.title: Segreti lunari: il tocco magico delle eclissi
courses.bio: Come sfruttare le eclissi per raggiungere i nostri obiettivi
objectives: In questo corso vedrai come è possibile utilizzare l'energia delle eclissi a tuo favore, nella tua vita.
Conoscerai i diversi significati delle eclissi, per modulare le energie lunari in vista dei tuoi obiettivi
Esplorerai diverse tecniche di indirizzamento positivo delle energie delle eclissi
Migliorerai il tuo campo vibrazionale grazie alle conoscenze acquisite sulle potenzialità delle eclissi

Introduzione: Introduzione
I poteri dei nodi lunari: Nodo lunare Nord e nodo lunare Sud
Sintesi finale: Come faccio a ottenere una carta del cielo natale?
Segreti lunari: il tocco magico delle eclissi

requirements: Persone interessate ad approfondire temi legati all'oroscopo e al tema natale
Studenti e studiosi di argomenti astrologici
courses.description:
Quando pensiamo all'astrologia ci viene in mente il tema natale, l'oroscopo quotidiano, ci chiediamo "di che segno sei?" o "qual è il tuo ascendente?".  Chi è un po' più informato, magari, ti chiede dove hai la Luna, o come sta messo il tuo Marte.
Ma è improbabile che qualcuno ti dica:  "sai?, la prossima eclissi cade proprio nella mia terza casa, chissà che discussioni dovrò fare con i vicini!"
Invece, le eclissi solari e lunari sono sorprendentemente importanti, sia per decodificare eventi della nostra vita (che fatichiamo a spiegarci), sia per farne un uso creativo.  E per creativo intendo, mettere in atto tecniche di attrazione di situazioni a noi favorevoli, o almeno non conflittuali con le nostre mete personali, visibili o invisibili.
In questo corso vedrai come è possibile utilizzare l'energia delle eclissi a tuo favore, nella tua vita.  Si tratta, sostanzialmente, di agire o non agire, fare o non fare, determinate azioni negli spazi temporali di manifestazione di un'eclissi.  Dare avvio a un progetto o, al contrario, chiudere un'esperienza che ha dato i suoi frutti ma ormai è diventata zavorra:  quando farlo?  Aspettare questi spazi temporali e agire  in sintonia con le energie che fluiscono dall'Universo è una buona strategìa "magica" per fare al meglio ciò che per noi è vitale.
Saprai cosa sono esattamente i nodi lunari e perché sono così importanti.  Apprenderai la tipologia delle eclissi, che è varia e articolata:  le eclissi non sono tutte uguali e non hanno tutte lo stesso effetto (e, comunque, non per tutti alla stessa maniera).
Conoscere le energie delle eclissi equivale a poterle utilizzare come porte che si aprono di tanto in tanto nel cielo... ma che possono aprirsi anche nella nostra vita.
target_audience: Se vuoi approfondire la conoscenza delle opportunità offerte dalla lettura astrologica delle energie, questo è il corso che fa per te
Se ti interessano i contesti culturali e magico-religiosi in cui si sviluppano certe pratiche e certe credenze collettive, approfondire il tema delle eclissi è una giusta scelta
Se sei interessato/a alle vibrazioni energetiche studiate dall'astrologia, questo corso ti fornirà approfondimenti molto concreti e utili nella lettura del tuo oroscopo

courses.title: Unfaire Angriffe? Sich gelassen und souverän behaupten
courses.bio: Bei unfairen Attacken oder Killerphrasen kommt es nicht auf Schlagfertigkeit an, sondern sich selbstsicher zu behaupten
objectives: Sie lernen, sich bei persönlichen Angriffen und Vorwürfen souverän und gelassen selbst zu behaupten

Warum es so schwer ist, auf unfaire Angr: Warum es so schwer ist, auf unfaire Angriffe souverän zu reagieren
Einleitung: Wie profitieren Sie am meisten von diesem Kurs?
Warum es so schwer ist auf unfaire Angri: Warum verletzen Sie manchmal Angriffe und manchmal nicht?
"Change it, love it or leave it"
"Change it": Wie Sie das Verhalten einer anderen Person ändern können.
Das biologische Alarmprogramm und seine: Das biologische Alarmprogramm und seine Auswirkungen
Vier Möglichkeiten, auf einen unfairen Angriff zu reagieren.
Kurze Entgegnungen auf unfaire Angriffe und dann schwiegen

requirements: Sie sollten bereit sein, ggf. ein neues Verhalten zu lernen
courses.description:
„Sie haben ja von der Praxis keine Ahnung!“ Oder: „Wieso dauert es so lange, bis ich dran bin?“ Solche und andere unfaire Attacken hat jeder von uns schon mal zu hören bekommen. Das macht einen oft wütend. Manchmal ist man deshalb sprachlos, wenn das während eines Gesprächs, eines Vortrags oder einer Besprechung passiert und man schweigt oder man reagiert zu heftig und ärgert sich dann auch noch über sich selbst, weil man ebenso emotional geworden ist. Doch Sie sind solchen Situationen nicht hilflos ausgeliefert.
In dem Onlinekurs lernen Sie, sich in aggressiven Situationen angemessen zu behaupten. Sie erfahren, dass es grundsätzlich drei Handlungsmöglichkeiten gibt, auf unfaire Angriffe zu reagieren. Meist nutzt man nur zwei: Zurückschlagen oder Schweigen. Doch es gibt noch eine dritte Möglichkeit: Sich mit kurzen Entgegnungen selbst zu behaupten. Damit zeigen Sie Grenzen auf, ohne die andere Person zu verletzen.
Damit verhindern Sie eine Eskalation, in der es letztlich nur darum geht, wer die Macht hat. Das Ziel dieses Onlinekurses ist es nicht, auf verbale Angriffe schlagfertig zu reagieren. Denn selbst wenn Sie humorvoll oder geistreich kontern, wissen Sie nicht, ob die andere Person, nicht beleidigt ist oder ihrerseits nochmal zurückschlägt. Wichtiger ist, Kontrolle über seine Gefühle, Einstellungen und Handlungen zu gewinnen, um sich nicht „um Kopf und Kragen“ zu reden und sich Feinde fürs Leben zu schaffen.
Wenn Sie stattdessen durch kurze Entgegnungen Zeit gewinnen, können Sie zukünftig solch kritische Situationen entschärfen, anstatt sie zu verschärfen. Das erreichen Sie durch souveräne Selbstbehauptung, eine leicht erlernbare Methode, die Ihnen Selbstsicherheit gibt und anderen Menschen zeigt, dass Wert darauf legen, gut behandelt zu werden.
target_audience: Alle, die sich in schwierigen Gesprächssituationen selbst behaupten möchten

courses.title: The Truth about Natural Confidence & Self-Esteem
courses.bio: Learn why you still struggle with confidence, why most tricks won’t work and which program has proven to work.

Welcome & Introduction: Are you in the right place?
Trying to be confident... the hard way?
The journey to becoming confident: Welcome to stage 1 of your journey!
The 3 secrets: The 3 things you need to know to start your transformation
Secret #1: Confidence & Self-Esteem are things YOU do
Secret #2: What keeps you not confident
Secret #3: How to rewire your brain to become truly confident
Welcome to stage 2 of your journey!
The transformation: The gap between your current self and fully confident people
The choice that will change your life

requirements: Understanding that this course does not contain the whole solution to confidence and self-esteem, but the clarity you need to be able to understand the problem and get the motivation to take the leap. As well as my recommendations once you are ready to make that transformation you are looking for. So adjust your expectations, and leave feedback in line with what this intro course is intended for.
courses.description:
>> Do not take this course untill you read this:
This part of the full transformation course on confidence and self esteem, is made available for free, to make it accessible to everyone. Do not expect the full program for free.
Powerful as it is, this course does not contain the whole solution to confidence and self-esteem, but the clarity you need to be able to understand the problem and get the motivation to take the leap. As well as my recommendations once you are ready to make that transformation you are looking for. So adjust your expectations, and leave feedback in line with what this intro course is intended for.


This is a deep introductory course that I give internationally via webinars. It will teach you what it really takes to become naturally confident.
Information and Transformation are two completely different things. Simple techniques don't really work in the long run and they require great amounts of your energy to maintain, since they rely on your limited will power. Most courses out there simply don't address the root cause of the problem.
So this course is about unlearning everything you know about confidence and self esteem, and focusing on the root cause, so that you become aware of the influence of your subconscious mind and so that you know what it takes to free yourself from its power.
Here are some testimonials from people who attended the live edition of the this course:
"This masterclass was amazing! Thank you so much!" - Mary H.
